mapper.select: select * from hotel_room r inner join hotel_reserve h on r.bno = h.bno where r.room_id=#{room_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_booking(book_id, room_id, guest_name, phone, name, room_type, price, checkin, checkout) VALUES (hotel_booking_seq.nextval, #{room_id}, #{guest_name}, #{phone}, #{name}, #{room_type}, #{price}, #{checkin}, #{checkout})
